function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of open and honest discussions about business realities and upcoming plans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unplanned response to the pandemic impact on the organization","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial resources for community consolidation and access to information","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social protection for low-paid insecure workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of protective equipment for at-risk workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and poor living conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste disposal posing biohazard risks, including potential transmission of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges around space, water, and sanitation in informal settlements increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements are at risk of eviction, leading to increased vulnerability to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control of covid-19 in informal settlements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of top-down control measures as oppressive","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contested governance structures and plural leadership","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality and poverty leading to varied vulnerability profiles in informal settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization and blame of residents of informal settlements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor coordination between health authorities and urban stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and sanitation in informal urban settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to social, political, and economic contexts influencing vulnerability to disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to basic services and public health interventions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and partnerships with local community structures and authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of formal data sources in informal settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on online crowdsourced mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and communication between data producers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation in settlements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Breakdown of support structures for vulnerable groups","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of predefined protocols for vulnerability in epidemic response","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mismanagement of deceased individuals leading to tension and resistance among local populations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fatigue and wariness in local populations due to lack of engagement by external agencies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of covid-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stigma associated with contracting covid-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"States of emergency and ’emergency thinking’ may preclude locally led and adapted responses, hindering effectiveness and harm reduction.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Precarious position of migrant workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Breakdown in social protection due to school closures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk of virus exposure for people with disabilities due to reliance on others and limited ability to self-isolate.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in accessing services and information for displaced people living in informal settlements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gender-specific impacts, including increased caring burdens for women and girls, uneven earning potential, and higher exposure risk for female health workers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heightened social tensions and security risks in informal settlements, including criminal activity and strained socioeconomic conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short and long-term mental health challenges for people with mental health problems and frontline responders.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insecurity and threats of eviction for tenants in informal settlements, exacerbated by the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
